configure_selected_light.title: Configure {light_name} White Balance
configure_selected_light.description:
Adjust white balance to match color appearance across different light brands.

White Balance Offset: Use positive values (+100, +200) to make warmer/more yellow, negative values (-100, -200) to make cooler/more blue.

Brightness Factor: Adjust relative brightness (0.8 = 80%, 1.2 = 120%)
